post.text: Together, we will bring the REAL CHANGE we've been waiting for!

comment.author: Solana
comment.text: How soon will you fix insurance? I'll be losing mine at the end of the year cause we can't afford it, and I have to have it for all of my health issues... this whole situation is crap. bummercare says we don't make enough for tax credit, and yet we make to much for medicaid... explain that one...

replies.author: Benjamin
replies.text: I'm in the same boat, I hope he makes this a top priority.

replies.author: Austin
replies.text: Billy - I understand. We are a middle class family of 6 and we are struggling to keep up with our healthcare payments. We are in so much healthcare debt and we can't get ahead of it. I don't know what we are going to do when the rates go up.

replies.author: Solana
replies.text: they've been feeding me pain pills for the past two years, now once I lose my insurance I'm going to get the "dope sick" cause I can't afford them with out ins. yay healthcare :\

replies.author: Elizabeth
replies.text: Here is trumps plan for fixing healthcare: he's going to tell you to pay for it, with your own money that you've saved. Just like before obamacare. And guess what it's still going to be just as expensive.

replies.author: Sarah
replies.text: Drain the swamp, cut salaries in Washington DC, no Syrian refugees , each are getting $920 monthly and etc. etc
